plot: John Oliver exposes the Alliance Defending Freedom, a legal organization that pushes court cases against LGBTQI+ rights under the guise of freedom and free speech, revealing its strategies to limit personal choices.

John Oliver shed a light on the Alliance Defending Freedom which is the legal organization behind many famous court cases that tries to cartel LGBTQI+ rights in the name of the freedom and free speech. He talks about their tactics and how they are actively working to undermine others freedom for life choices.—Niaz Islam Arif
